1.name: Crown of Light
1.effect: **[Judgement Blade]** Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases DMG by `plhdr1%` upon every use. This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.

3.effect: **[Cook from Hell]** Applies healing effects to all allies and reduces Cooldown of **[Cook from Hell]** by `plhdr1` sec.

4.name: Apron of Honor
4.effect: **[Open for Business!]** Increases DEF boost by 50%. While under **[Cook from Hell]**, reduces ATK Spd of all enemies by 100.

1.name: Special Boots of Stockade
1.effect: **[Mace of Rehabilitation]** Reduces P.DEF of hit enemy by 25% for 10 sec, and adds Reduction Effect on Heal Rate by `plhdr1%` in Disarmament state.

2.name: Pendant of War God
2.effect: **[Merciless Gale]** Increases DMG by 50% and reduces Cooldown by `plhdr1%` for each enemy hit.

3.name: Merciless Skull Knuckle
3.effect: **[Last Execution]** Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases own DMG to Boss by `plhdr1%` per use. This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.

4.name: Ominous Manicure
4.effect: **[Massacre Instinct]** **[Cruel Madness]** becomes irremovable. Upon activation, reduces Cooldown of all skills by `plhdr1%` immediately.

1.name: Bracelet of Elidora
1.effect: **[This Will Hurt!]** Increases Heal Rate of allies within range by `plhdr1%` for 4 sec and reduces Heal Rate of hit enemies by 50% for 4 sec.

2.name: Crystal of the Forest
2.effect: **[On Guard!]** Increases DEF Boost by 50%, and increases Crit Chance by `plhdr1` for 5 sec.

3.name: Wind Elemental's Nest
3.effect: **[Hya! Kya! Take This!]** Increases ACC by 750 and CC ACC by `plhdr1` for the duration of skill.

4.name: Feather of Wind
4.effect: **[Let Us Challenge Together!]** P.DEF Boost is applied to all allies and adds `plhdr1%` P.DMG Reduction Effect for the duration of Skill.

1.name: Worn Army Hat
1.effect: **[I See Through Your Every Move!]** Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases the duration of blind by `plhdr1` sec.

2.name: The Playstarter
2.effect: **[Shoot You Full of Holes!]** Upon using this Skill, Hanus gains 20 Ammo. While Hanus is consuming Ammo to shoot a machine gun, Hanus' ATK is increased by `plhdr1%`. This effect can be stacked up to max 100 times.

3.name: Mini Hanus
3.effect: **[Hide If You Can!]** Hanus gains immunity to CC for the duration of Skill, and reduces Heal Rate of the hit target by `plhdr1%` for 5 sec.

4.name: Medal of Honor
4.effect: **[I Shall Train You Hard!]** At the beginning of a Guild War battle, reduces Mana Cost of Hanus' Skill by 1, only for one Skill use. Also, increases all allies' ATK by `plhdr1%` and Crit DMG by `plhdr2%` for 10 sec.

1.name: Rune of the Flow
1.effect:
**[Tremble!]** Increase All DMG Reduction effect of the Skill by an additional `plhdr1%`.
**[Kneel.]** Reduces Mana Cost by 1.

2.name: Eye of the God King
2.effect: **[Behold My Might]** Increases DMG by 50% and when Cain is in **[Tyrant]** form, increases DMG by `plhdr1%`.

3.name: Chest of Integrity
3.effect:
**[Gaze Upon My Almighty Power!]** Increases ATK Boost by 50%.
**[Now Die]** Increases P.DMG the target takes by `plhdr1%`.

4.name: Archive of Sekireinel
4.effect: **[King of the Desert]** Increases ATK Boost by 50%. If there are 3 or more stacks of **[King of the Desert]**, increases Heal Rate of all allies by `plhdr1%`.
